I have ran for a pretty long time and still see no errors. @ankitkv see my PR torch/cutorch#714. If you want, try cloning CuTorch and patching in that PR. Then you can copy over the THC directory to your PyTorch repo:

cp -r <path/to/cutorch/>lib/THC <path/to/pytorch>/torch/lib/THC

and rebuild PyTorch. If you can repro the issue with that patch in place that would be tremendously useful, or if it fixes your error that is useful as well.
